dmca.title: Notice of Service Mark Infringement
dmca.body:
You are listed as registrant of the website www.onecle.com. We are writing to advise you of our concerns about your unauthorized use of a New Century employment agreement on the page http://contracts.onecle.com/new-century-financial/cole-employment-2006-03-29.shtml. New Century's employment contract with Mr. Cole is proprietary work product and it's unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.  In addition,  the use of the name NEW CENTURY is also without our permission.

The mark NEW CENTURY MORTGAGE (R) is the intellectual property of New Century Mortgage Corporation, pursuant to a Service Mark filed with the United States Patent and Trademark Office on June 18, 1999. We began using NEW CENTURY as early as 1996 for mortgage services, and developed through the years enormous goodwill in the mark NEW CENTURY in the mortgage industry field.  The mark remains a valuable asset, which we vigorously protect.

This unpermitted use of our work product and service marks must cease immediately. Please contact us to confirm steps you will take to abate this infringement. At minimum, we insist that you remove all references to NEW CENTURY and BOB COLE from the website.

We look forward to hearing from you and your anticipated amicable cooperation.
